title: Mueller 104-517 Anti-Siphon Frost-Proof Wall Hydrant
features: Prevents outside faucet freezing and protects against back siphoning
description: Prevents outside faucet freezing and protects against back siphoning. A built-in backflow preventer checks siphoning back into the water supply. The sill cock drains automatically upon water shut-off if the hose is removed or open. 1/2" nominal copper sweat or 1/2" MIP. Import. Product is manufactured in China . This product meets customer requirement.
